articles.title: Coronavirus fear: COVID-19 may be airborne, says study - Express.co.uk
articles.description: COVID-19 may be able to travel via aerosol particles, increasing the possibility of airborne infection, and emphasising the importance of stringent hygiene measures, a new study has indicated.
